doc.title: Circular Panorama of Atlantic City, N.J.
doc.plot: The camera was placed with the lens pointed toward the famous board walk in Atlantic City. During the exposure of the film the camera is slowly revolved from left to right, taking in the immense crowds of surf bathers during the revolution of the camera and ending by looking out over the ocean, taking in Young's pier and showing a number of sail boats cruising about close in shore.
